name: Formester
author: Formester Team

sections.description:
Formester is a simple and powerful tool that helps businesses grow by connecting with people online. It’s the go-to [HTML form builder] (https://formester.com/) for creating engaging, feature-packed online forms. With a wide range of designs, features, and integrations, Formester allows you to collect and analyze form submission data all in one place.

Why Choose Formester?

Formester is an online tool that doesn’t need any coding. It helps companies grow by talking to their audience. With Formester, you can create forms, quizzes, and surveys to connect with people better. New to Formester? Sign up here.

Make Your Forms Stand Out

Formester’s conditional logic & information recall features make the forms feel like a conversation, which gets more people to respond. It helps you gather leads, recommend products, grow your contact list, get feedback, register signups, and answer common questions easily. Plus, it’s enjoyable for your visitors.

Always On-Brand, No Design Skills Required

Upload logos, set color palettes, and create themes everyone on your team can use. You can customize your font, background, images, and videos to match your brand for a seamlessly integrated experience.

Features

  • Easy Embedding: Add forms to your website without any complicated coding. See Feature
  • Personalized Design: Customize your forms to match your unique style & brand. See Feature
  • Information Recall: Automatically send replies to thank users, confirm submissions, or provide more info. See Feature
  • Powerful Analytics: Collect and analyze data with Formester, integrated with Webflow. See Feature
  • Advanced Integrations: Connect with various tools and services to streamline your workflow. See Integrations

Privacy

By using this plugin, you agree to our terms and conditions. Learn more about how we handle your data on our website.
We don’t track personal data when you install this plugin, only anonymous information to improve the user experience.
sections.installation:
1. Add the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your formester forms through the “Add block” button that has been added to post/pages editor aside of the Media Button
  4. Add your formester\’s URL in the input and configure it from the options available
sections.changelog:
v 1.0
– added formester block for rendering formester forms.
v 1.1
– update assets
